solution_line_template: Robert coughs twice as much as Georgia who coughs {georgia_coughs_per_min} times so Robert coughs {robert_multiplier}*{georgia_coughs_per_min} = <<{robert_multiplier}*{georgia_coughs_per_min}={robert_coughs_per_min}>>{robert_coughs_per_min} coughs per minute

Georgia coughs {georgia_coughs_per_min} times and Robert coughs {robert_coughs_per_min} times so together they cough {georgia_coughs_per_min}+{robert_coughs_per_min} = <<{georgia_coughs_per_min}+{robert_coughs_per_min}={total_coughs_per_min}>>{total_coughs_per_min} times per minute
After {minutes} minutes they will have coughed {total_coughs_per_min}*{minutes} = <<{total_coughs_per_min}*{minutes}={total_coughs}>>{total_coughs} coughs
